001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004
005import java.io.*;
006
007/**
008 * The main class that parses the command line and communicates with the
009 * Airline server using REST.
010 */
011public class Project5 {
012
013    public static final String MISSING_ARGS = "Missing command line arguments";
014
015    public static void main(String... args) throws IOException {
016        String hostName = null;
017        String portString = null;
018        String airlineName = null;
019        String flightNumberString = null;
020
021        for (String arg : args) {
022            if (arg.equals("-README")) {
023                printReadmeAndExit();
024
025            } else if (hostName == null) {
026                hostName = arg;
027
028            } else if ( portString == null) {
029                portString = arg;
030
031            } else if (airlineName == null) {
032                airlineName = arg;
033
034            } else if (flightNumberString == null) {
035                flightNumberString = arg;
036
037            } else {
038                usage("Extraneous command line argument: " + arg);
039            }
040        }
041
042        if (hostName == null) {
043            usage( MISSING_ARGS );
044            return;
045
046        } else if ( portString == null) {
047            usage("Missing port");
048            return;
049
050        } else if (airlineName == null) {
051            usage("Missing airline name");
052            return;
053        }
054
055        int port;
056        try {
057            port = Integer.parseInt( portString );
058
059        } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
060            usage("Port \"" + portString + "\" must be an integer");
061            return;
062        }
063
064        AirlineRestClient client = new AirlineRestClient(hostName, port);
065
066        try {
067            if (flightNumberString == null) {
068                // Pretty print airline
069                Airline airline = client.getAirline(airlineName);
070                new PrettyPrinter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out)).dump(airline);
071
072            } else {
073                // Add the flight
074                client.addFlight(airlineName, new Flight(Integer.parseInt(flightNumberString)));
075            }
076
077        } catch (IOException | ParserException ex ) {
078            error("While contacting server: " + ex);
079            return;
080        }
081
082        System.exit(0);
083    }
084
085    private static void printReadmeAndExit() throws IOException {
086        InputStream readme = Project5.class.getResourceAsStream("README.txt");
087        try (
088          BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(readme))
089          ) {
090            for (String line = reader.readLine(); line != null; line = reader.readLine()) {
091                System.out.println(line);
092            }
093        }
094
095    }
096
097    private static void error( String message )
098    {
099        PrintStream err = System.err;
100        err.println("** " + message);
101
102        System.exit(1);
103    }
104
105    /**
106     * Prints usage information for this program and exits
107     * @param message An error message to print
108     */
109    private static void usage( String message )
110    {
111        PrintStream err = System.err;
112        err.println("** " + message);
113        err.println();
114        err.println("usage: java Project5 host port [word] [definition]");
115        err.println("  host         Host of web server");
116        err.println("  port         Port of web server");
117        err.println("  word         Word in dictionary");
118        err.println("  definition   Definition of word");
119        err.println();
120        err.println("This simple program posts words and their definitions");
121        err.println("to the server.");
122        err.println("If no definition is specified, then the word's definition");
123        err.println("is printed.");
124        err.println("If no word is specified, all dictionary entries are printed");
125        err.println();
126
127        System.exit(1);
128    }
129}
